author: The Sun
title: Ground News - Gary Neville stuns fans with 'thoughtful and sharp' Dragon's Den return
text:
Summary by The Sun GARY NEVILLE was praised by viewers as he returned to Dragons’ Den on Thursday night. The Manchester United legend, 49, made his debut on the hit BBC show last month. PAGary Neville, second from right, made a second appearance on Dragons’ Den on Thursday[/caption] BBCHe impressed viewers with his business knowledge[/caption] He boasts a £100million empire which includes five-star hotels, restaurants, pubs and Salford City FC. And his second appe… Share menu 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
